thread.title: Michelle B
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Michelle B

author: Michelle B
title: Michelle B
text: I can't believe I waited 10 years to replace my sectional. I am in love with my new sofa and love seat and the price was perfect. They were not pushy. They let us look around to find our perfect fit. I love the fact that I could see all the choices without running around a store that appears to be like a mouse maze.
